version_description:
(بالعربي في الاسفل)
With this update, Anghami puts your favorite series and movies at your fingertips.
Watch the best series and movies in full HD, with Arabic and English subtitles right here and anytime you want.

• We refreshed the video full screen with better control over quality & subtitles and allowing you to switch to Airplay or Chromecast easier. We also made multiple fixes to make your video experience smoother.
• You can now filter music in both playlists & likes
• Chromecast was refreshed and is ready for you. Connect your device and enjoy the music
• Your homepage was updated to make things easier and smoother
• Watch the story of music you love to discover songs & people who share your taste
• Share your music via Snapchat
• Bitmojis are here! Send a bitmoji via Chats or set it as your profile picture

Rate us 5 stars or send us your feedback by tweeting @anghamiCare or emailing feedback@anghami.com

أنغامي تضع مسلسلاتك وأفلامك المفضلة بين يديك في هذا التحديث.
يمكنك مشاهدة أفضل المسلسلات والأفلام بدقة عالية، مع ترجمة باللغة العربية والانجليزية وفي أي وقت تريد.

• صفحتك الرئيسية بحلّة جديدة لتكتشف الموسيقى بشكل أفضل وأسهل
• أصبح كروم كاست جاهزاً لذا قم بوصل جهازك واستمتع بموسيقتك
• شاهد القصة الموسيقية واكتشف أغانٍ وأشخاص يتمتعون بنفس ذوقك الموسيقي
• يمكنك الآن فلترة موسيقتك بحسب النوع الذي تفضله في كل من قوائمك وإعجاباتك
• شارك موسيقتك الآن على سناب شات
• Bitmoji أصبحت متوفرة لترسلها في الدردشات وتستخدمها كصورة صفحتك الشخصية

عبّر عن حبّك لأنغامي وأعطنا تصنيف 5 نجوم! أو أرسل ملاحظاتك إلينا على feedback@anghami.com أو غرّد على تويتر anghamiCare@

(بالعربي في الاسفل)
With this update, Anghami puts your favorite series and movies at your fingertips.
Watch the best series and movies in full HD, with Arabic and English subtitles right here and anytime you want.

• We tightened many nuts & bolts around ChromeCast to make your video experience better.
• We refreshed the video full screen with better control over quality & subtitles and allowing you to switch to Airplay or Chromecast easier. We also made multiple fixes to make your video experience smoother.
• You can now filter music in both playlists & likes
• Chromecast was refreshed and is ready for you. Connect your device and enjoy the music
• Your homepage was updated to make things easier and smoother
• Watch the story of music you love to discover songs & people who share your taste
• Share your music via Snapchat
• Bitmojis are here! Send a bitmoji via Chats or set it as your profile picture

Rate us 5 stars or send us your feedback by tweeting @anghamiCare or emailing feedback@anghami.com

With this update, Anghami puts your favorite series and movies at your fingertips.
Watch the best series and movies in full HD, with Arabic and English subtitles right here and anytime you want.
• The video experience is much faster and consumes significantly less bandwidth & battery now.
• We also tightened many nuts & bolts around ChromeCast to make your video experience better.
• We refreshed the video full screen with better control over quality & subtitles and allowing you to switch to Airplay or Chromecast easier. We also made multiple fixes to make your video experience smoother.
• You can now filter music in both playlists & likes
• Chromecast was refreshed and is ready for you. Connect your device and enjoy the music
• Your homepage was updated to make things easier and smoother
• Watch the story of music you love to discover songs & people who share your taste
• Share your music via Snapchat
• Bitmojis are here! Send a bitmoji via Chats or set it as your profile picture

Rate us 5 stars or send us your feedback by tweeting @anghamiCare or emailing feedback@anghami.com

(بالعربي في الاسفل)
With this update, Anghami puts your favorite series and movies at your fingertips.
Watch the best series and movies in full HD, with Arabic and English subtitles right here and anytime you want.

• The video experience is much faster and consumes significantly less bandwidth & battery now.
• We also tightened many nuts & bolts around ChromeCast to make your video experience better - including on iPad.
• We refreshed the video full screen with better control over quality & subtitles and allowing you to switch to Airplay or Chromecast easier. We also made multiple fixes to make your video experience smoother.
• You can now filter music in both playlists & likes
• Chromecast was refreshed and is ready for you. Connect your device and enjoy the music
• Your homepage was updated to make things easier and smoother
• Watch the story of music you love to discover songs & people who share your taste
• Share your music via Snapchat
• Bitmojis are here! Send a bitmoji via Chats or set it as your profile picture
Rate us 5 stars or send us your feedback by tweeting @anghamiCare or emailing feedback@anghami.com

(بالعربي في الاسفل)
With this update, Anghami puts your favorite series and movies at your fingertips.
Watch the best series and movies in full HD, with Arabic and English subtitles right here and anytime you want.
• The video screen can fill your screen by double tapping it, it also can be connected to an HDMI adapter.
• The video experience is much faster and consumes significantly less bandwidth & battery now.
• We also tightened many nuts & bolts around ChromeCast to make your video experience better - including on iPad.
• We refreshed the video full screen with better control over quality & subtitles and allowing you to switch to Airplay or Chromecast easier. We also made multiple fixes to make your video experience smoother.
• You can now filter music in both playlists & likes
• Chromecast was refreshed and is ready for you. Connect your device and enjoy the music
• Your homepage was updated to make things easier and smoother
• Watch the story of music you love to discover songs & people who share your taste
• Share your music via Snapchat
• Bitmojis are here! Send a bitmoji via Chats or set it as your profile picture
Rate us 5 stars or send us your feedback by tweeting @anghamiCare or emailing feedback@anghami.com

عبّر عن حبّك لأنغامي وأعطنا تصنيف 5 نجوم! أو أرسل ملاحظاتك إلينا على feedback@anghami.com أو غرّد على تويتر anghamiCare@

(بالعربي في الاسفل)
You might not be able to put your headphones down after this update.
• We made shuffling smarter so you enjoy playing music randomly. When you hit shuffle we will make sure to prioritize what you haven't heard recently .
• Your podcast page & player got a makeover to give you more control.
• We freshened up your inbox with a brand new look.
Get ready for an improved and more entertaining listening experience!

Rate us 5 stars or send us your feedback by tweeting @anghamiCare or emailing feedback@anghami.com

أجرينا بعض التغييرات والتعديلات لنجعل تجربتك أفضل.
• علبة الواردات أصبحت أكثر انتعاشاً وجمالية.
• مشغّل البودكاست اتّخذ حلّة جديدة لتتمكن من التحكّم بالحلقات بسرعة وسهولة.
• الموسيقى العشوائية خضعت لبعض التغييرات لتستمتع بأغانيك أكثر فأكثر.
استمتع معنا بتجربة متميزة ستحسّن عالمك الموسيقي الخاص.

عبّر عن حبّك لأنغامي وأعطنا تصنيف 5 نجوم! أو أرسل ملاحظاتك إلينا على feedback@anghami.com أو غرّد على تويتر anghamiCare@

(بالعربي في الاسفل)
You might not be able to put your headphones down after this update.
• We made shuffling smarter so you enjoy playing music randomly. When you hit shuffle we will make sure to prioritize what you haven't heard recently .
• Your podcast page & player got a makeover to give you more control.
• We freshened up your inbox with a brand new look.
Get ready for an improved and more entertaining listening experience!
Rate us 5 stars or send us your feedback by tweeting @anghamiCare or emailing feedback@anghami.com

• مشغّل البودكاست اتّخذ حلّة جديدة لتتمكن من التحكّم بالحلقات بسرعة وسهولة.
• الموسيقى العشوائية خضعت لبعض التغييرات لتستمتع بأغانيك أكثر فأكثر.
استمتع معنا بتجربة متميزة ستحسّن عالمك الموسيقي الخاص.

عبّر عن حبّك لأنغامي وأعطنا تصنيف 5 نجوم! أو أرسل ملاحظاتك إلينا على feedback@anghami.com أو غرّد على تويتر anghamiCare@

(بالعربي في الاسفل)
We're working under the hood for a better & faster Anghami.
• We tightened some bolts so that the app still works even if Facebook has issues like what recently happened and affected many of you.
• We made shuffling smarter so you enjoy playing music randomly. When you hit shuffle we will make sure to prioritize what you haven't heard recently.
• Your podcast page & player got a makeover to give you more control.
• We freshened up your inbox with a brand new look.
Get ready for an improved and more entertaining listening experience!
Rate us 5 stars or send us your feedback by tweeting @anghamiCare or emailing feedback@anghami.com

(بالعربي في الأسفل)
We're working under the hood for a better & faster Anghami.

- We gave Settings a fresh new look! We tidied things up to make personalizing the app easier for you. You can now even search within your Settings.
- Did you visit the Music Rooms? Find songs inspired by your taste and discover your music buddies.
- Driving your Ford and want to play your music? Anghami is now available on Ford SYNC.
- The more, the merrier! We tweaked Chat to give you more sharing options. Share with your friends the song you’re playing, your favorite playlists, create a shared Mixtape, or gift them Anghami Plus.

- Easy Peasy! We made subscribing to Anghami Plus easier by giving the tab a simplified look.

Get ready for an improved and more entertaining listening experience!
Rate us 5 stars or send us your feedback by tweeting @anghamiCare or emailing feedback@anghami.com

أجرينا بعض التغييرات والتعديلات لنجعل تجربتك أفضل.
- مظهر جديد للإعدادات حيث يمكنك التعديل والبحث عن كل ما تريد.
- هل زرت الغرف الموسيقيّة؟ اكتشف أغاني مستوحاة من ذوقك وتعرّف على أصدقائك في الموسيقى.
- هل تقود سيارة فورد وترغب بالاستماع إلى الموسيقى؟ أنغامي متوفّر الآن على Ford SYNC.
- أضفنا خيارات جديدة إلى الدردشات لتتمكّن من مشاركة المزيد مع أصدقائك. أرسل لهم الأغنية التي تستمع إليها أو قوائمك المُفضلة أو أنشئ ميكس الأصدقاء أو اهديهم أنغامي بلس.
- لقد جعلنا الاشتراك بأنغامي بلس أسهل من خلال صفحة اشتراك جديدة ومنعشة.

استمتع معنا بتجربة متميزة ستأخذك إلى عالمك الموسيقي الخاص.

- مُشغّل موسيقى السيارة أصبح جاهزاً لتتحكم بموسيقتك بسرعة وسهولة وأنت تقود سيارتك.

- أضفنا خيارات جديدة إلى الدردشات لتتمكّن من مشاركة المزيد مع أصدقائك. أرسل لهم الأغنية التي تستمع إليها أو قوائمك المُفضلة أو أنشئ ميكس الأصدقاء أو اهديهم أنغامي بلس.
- لقد جعلنا الاشتراك بأنغامي بلس أسهل من خلال صفحة اشتراك جديدة ومنعشة.

- Siri got smarter with Anghami. Just ask Siri to play your favorite music on Anghami. You could say, "Hey Siri, play Camilla Cabello on Anghami." or "Hey Siri, play me some Rock on Anghami." or "Hey Siri, like this song on Anghami". It works with songs, albums, artists, playlists, downloads, mixtapes, likes and more. Whether you're on your phone, HomePod, or in CarPlay, Siri will make listening to your music a little easier. Try it today!
- Added support to import your music from more apps.
- Multiple bug fixes especially for iOS13.

- Siri got smarter with Anghami. Just ask to play your favorite music like “Hey Siri, play Camilla Cabello on Anghami”. It works with songs, albums, playlists, downloads and more!
- You can now import your music from more apps.
- Multiple bug fixes especially for iOS13.

- Siri got smarter with Anghami. Just ask to play your favorite music like “Hey Siri, play Camilla Cabello on Anghami”. It works with songs, albums, playlists, downloads and more!
- You can now import your music from more apps.
- Multiple bug fixes especially for iOS13.

We apologize in advance, but our engineers have been nagging on us to let them write the release notes, so here you go:
- This update includes several bug fixes and performance improvements (Just kidding, we don’t create bugs, we’re perfect).
- New Decade New Library! Cheesy we know but we couldn't think of anything else. We revamped it to include all of your songs and podcasts for the best experience in the WHOLE UNIVERSE.
- Chats & notifications were moved to the new explore page for easier access. You now have 3 tabs instead of 5, unless you’re free, you still have 4, because oh well..
- Knock, knock. Who's there? More Mixtapesssss! We’re creating more and more personalized mixtapes just for you, check out the new “Created for You” section in your library.

PS: This update does include a lot of bug fixes and performance improvements (We lied about being perfect earlier) which led to super duper pretty code and a smoother experience for you guys.

We’re bringing you many bug fixes and improvements in this update
 
- Looking for a certain podcast episode? You can now search for it from the podcast itself 
- We made grouping downloads by album available for you  
- You can now sort your playlist songs by alphabetical order. 
- Your playlist is missing your favorite songs? Add multiple songs from your downloads to the playlist of your choice.

We’re bringing you many bug fixes and improvements in this update

- Looking for a certain podcast episode? You can now search for it from the podcast itself
- We made grouping downloads by album available for you  
- You can now sort your playlist songs by alphabetical order. 
- Your playlist is missing your favorite songs? Add multiple songs from your downloads to the playlist of your choice.

New users will get to enjoy a cool and smooth onboarding flow, designed to personalize their music and introduce them to the best musical experience

You can now search for your favorite songs and albums from the artist’s profile directly

This update also includes some bug fixes and performance improvements

Introducing the latest & coolest feature: Live Radio.

Whether you’re looking to host an intimate music session with your friends or your loved one, or attend a virtual party, Live Radio will let you do all that.

Choose the music you want, invite your friends so you can all listen to the same music together. They will be able to clap or just tell you what they think about your music taste in the comment section.

Try it and let the fun music sessions begin.

Make room for the new widgets.
Now on iOS 14, widgets let you easily & quickly control your music from your home screen directly, making your music experience smoother and enjoyable.
We've also added many bug fixes and performance improvements.
